speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on June 22, 2007, I was unable to be present for all rollcall votes due to an unexpected delay. If present, I would have voted accordingly on the following rollcall votes: roll No. 543--"nay"; roll No. 544--"nay"; roll No. 545--"aye"; roll No. 546--"aye"; roll No. 547--"aye"; roll No. 548--"nay".
